attributes.action: PAYE deductions to be at 10p in the £
attributes.additional_details: Deductions at source in form of PAYE to be reduced to 10p in every £1 earned.  Ergo Low wage-earners of £200 per week shall contribute £2 to National purse.  Higher wage-earners of £1,000 per week shall accordingly contribute £10.  These contributions will be sufficient to keep our Country running smoothly, with no excess, so no problems on how same should be spent.
